name: The Long Rains
description:
Over a thousand years ago,  art, poetry and literature were at their height in the golden age of Japanese culture.

As a young woman starting out in life, your choices can make your reputation- or ruin it! 

How will your story finish? 

  • Marry the Emperor?
  • Meet the love of your life?
  • Publish your scandalous memoirs?
  • Make an impression at the Imperial Court?
  • Be eaten by demons?

The choice- and the story-is yours alone!

Set in the world of the Heian-era webcomic Beneath The Clouds
